sourceOrganization.name: NIAID SAVE Program
sourceOrganization.abstract: SARS-CoV-2 Assessment of Viral Evolution (SAVE) provides real-time risk assessment of emerging SARS-CoV-2 mutations that may impact transmissibility and virulence. This program supports the SARS-CoV-2 Interagency Group (SIG) by evaluating viral evolution and informing public health responses.
sourceOrganization.description: To support the generation of data for the SARS-CoV-2 Interagency Group (SIG), NIAID has created the SARS-CoV-2 Assessment of Viral Evolution (SAVE) risk-assessment pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 variant viruses. SAVE provides a comprehensive real-time risk assessment of emerging mutations in SARS-CoV-2 that could impact transmissibility, virulence, and susceptibility to infection- or vaccine-induced immunity. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/sars-cov-2-assessment-viral-evolution-program
